text: Ali Ansarian (; 5 July 1977 – 3 February 2021) was an Iranian football player. He died on 3 February 2021 due to COVID-19. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Hazfi Cup Asia Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Persepolis 1998–99 Azadegan 9 1 4 0 0 0 13 1 1999–00 17 0 2 0 4 0 23 0 2000–01 19 1 1 0 9 1 29 2 2001–02 Pro League 22 3 3 2 - - 25 5 2002–03 21 5 3 0 24 5 Total 88 10 10 2 16 1 114 13 Saipa 2003–04 Pro League 6 0 - - Persepolis 2004–05 Pro League 22 2 - - 2005–06 26 9 - - Total 48 11 48 11 Esteghlal 2006–07 Pro League 23 4 - - Steel Azin 2007–08 Division 1 20 2 - - Esteghlal Ahvaz 2008–09 Pro League 14 0 - - Gostaresh 2009–10 Division 1 12 0 - - 2010–11 1 0 0 0 - - 1 0 Total 13 0 13 0 Shahrdari Tabriz 2010–11 Pro League 18 0 0 0 - - 18 0 Shahin 2011–12 Pro League 10 0 2 0 - - 12 0 Career total 240 27 12 2 16 1 268 30 ==Honours== Persepolis *Iran's Azadegan Football League: 1998–99, 1999–2000 *Iran Pro League: 2001–02 *Hazfi Cup: 1999 Shahin Bushehr *Hazfi Cup: runner-up 2012 ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Iranian footballers Category:Persian Gulf Pro League players Category:Azadegan League players Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Persepolis F.C. players Category:Iran international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tehran Category:Sportspeople from Tehran
